overview: Payton (they/them), an insecure young person amidst a move-in to their new apartment, wants another shot with their opinionated ex, Camila (she/her). When she actually agrees to one last meetup, Payton begins to think that a reunion between the two and their beloved couple chairs could help reignite an old spark between them. The problem is, Payton abandoned those chairs back at their's and Camilaâ€™s old place after the breakup ended horrifically.
tagline: We are a mosaic of everyone we've ever met, and we've met some terrible people.
title: Silhouette
